title: New: Stay + – Eyes (feat. NO CEREMONY///)
body:
The new cut from hell-bent producer **[Stay +](https://www.facebook.com/staystaystay)** is a dramatic and dark force. Featuring the interestingly named **[NO CEREMONY///](http://noceremony.com/)**, it blisters the frontal lobe with its howls and screeches, yet manages to somehow soothe with it’s blissed out melodies and echo laden synth scapes.

Hit play below.

excerpt.full: The new cut from hell-bent producer Stay + is a dramatic and dark force. Featuring the interestingly named NO CEREMONY///, it blisters the frontal lobe with its howls and screeches, yet manages to somehow soothe with it’s blissed out melodies and echo laden synth scapes. Hit play below.
